#summary MIscore library.

= miscore library =
This library calculates molecular interactions confidence scores using "MIscore".

== Maven dependency ==
{{{
  <dependency>
    <groupId>uk.ac.ebi.enfin.mi.score</groupId>
    <artifactId>miscore</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.2</version>
  </dependency>
}}}
{{{
  <repository>
    <id>ebi-repo</id>
    <name>EBI Repository</name>
    <url>scp://lobster.ebi.ac.uk/homes/maven/public_html/m2repo</url>
  </repository>
}}}
<br>
=== An example of how to create a POM file using miscore: ===
http://code.google.com/p/enfin-core/source/browse/trunk/enfin-core/clients/miscoreClient/pom.xml
http://code.google.com/p/miscore/source/browse/trunk/miscore-example/pom.xml

== Example ==
Here an example of how to use miscore to obtaing a confidence score for a molecular interaction:
<br>
http://code.google.com/p/miscore/source/browse/trunk/miscore-example/src/main/java/MIScoreClient.java
